CustomField.description: If checked (TRUE) this feature can be selected in the product selection visualforce page (it has a checkbox). If unchecked (FALSE) the feature cannot be selected (i.e. a header / parent) Field Type: IA Integrated: Y
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If checked (TRUE) this feature can be selected in the product selection visualforce page. If unchecked (FALSE) the feature cannot be selected (i.e. a header / parent)
CustomField.label: Selectable
